text: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: And We have constantly conveyed the Word [of admonition] to them[23], so that they may take heed.
footnotes: [23] i.e., to the pagans of Makkah and the Jews from among the Children of Israel about the consequences of the doomed nations.
